name: abandoned
description: When there is no eventual need.

name: backport
description: Issues and PRs related to backporting features and bug fixes to previous versions.

name: blocked
description: PRs that are blocked by other issues/PRs.

name: browser
description: Issues and PRs related to browser.

name: bug
description: Issues and PRs related to incorrect behaviour.

name: build
description: Issues and PRs related to build files.

name: ci
description: Issues and PRs related to the CI.

name: cli
description: Issues and PRs related to command line interface.

name: coverage
description: Issues and PRs related to code coverage.

name: deprecations
description: Issues and PRs related to deprecations.

name: deps
description: Issues and PRs related to dependencies.

name: discussion
description: Issues that are meant for discussion.

name: doc
description: Issues and PRs related to the documentations.

name: duplicate
description: Issues and PRs that are duplicates of other issues or PRs.

name: enhancement
description: Issues and PRs that add new features.

name: feature request
description: Issues that request new features.

name: good first issue
description: Issues that are suitable for first-time contributors.

name: help wanted
description: Issues that need assistance from volunteers or PRs that need help to proceed.

name: in progress
description: Issues and PRs that are in progress.

name: invalid
description: Issues and PRs that are invalid.

name: investigating
description: Issues and PRs that are not confirmed.

name: known limitation
description: Issues that are identified as known limitations.

name: landed
description: PRs that were landed.

name: lint
description: Issues and PRs related to linter.

name: macos
description: Issues and PRs related to the macOS platform.

name: meta
description: Issues or PRs related to the general management of the project.

name: performance
description: Issues and PRs related to the performance.

name: question
description: Issues that look for answers.

name: refactoring
description: Issues and PRs related to refactoring existing code.

name: regression
description: Issues related to regressions.

name: release
description: Issues and PRs related to releases of new versions.

name: repro-exists
description: Issues with reproductions.

name: research
description: Issues and PRs related to research.

name: review wanted
description: PRs that need reviews.

name: revisit later
description: Inactionable items that could be revisited later.

name: security
description: Issues and PRs related to security.

name: semver-major
description: PRs that contain breaking changes and should be released in the next major version.

name: semver-minor
description: PRs that contain new features and should be released in the next minor version.

name: semver-patch
description: PRs that contain bug fixes and should be released in the next patch version.

name: stalled
description: Issues and PRs that are stalled.

name: test
description: Issues and PRs related to the tests.

name: triage-high
description: Issues and PRs that have high priority.

name: triage-low
description: Issues and PRs that have low priority.

name: triage-normal
description: Issues and PRs that have normal priority.

name: triage-paused
description: Issues and PRs that were paused.

name: windows
description: Issues and PRs related to the Windows platform.

name: wontfix
description: Issues that will not be fixed, e.g. due to backwards compatibility concerns.
